screen_desc: This screenshot shows a mobile home screen with a Google search bar at the top and various app icons below. Common apps such as Photos, Maps, Gmail, Play Store, and YouTube are at the top. Below these are other apps organized into categories, including Calendar, Camera, Drive, Duo, and Chrome. The bottom row features more apps, including Facebook, Google Maps, and Messages. The layout is a typical Android app grid design.
